text1: All dogs have tails. Max is a dog.
hint: Think about what we know about dogs

text1: Red is bigger than Blue. Green is smaller than Blue.
If it rains, grass gets wet. It is raining.
Cats meow. Fluffy is a cat.
Amy is taller than Ben. Ben is taller than Carl.
All birds have feathers. A penguin is a bird.
No fish can fly. Nemo is a fish.
A square has 4 sides. This shape has 3 sides.
Tom has more apples than Sue. Sue has more than Pat. Pat has 3 apples.
text2: Tom has at least how many?

text1: In a race: A is not first. B beats C. C beats A.
Start with 5. Double it. Subtract 2. Divide by 4.
Every Zorp is a Blip. No Blip is a Crag.
